alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Taylor County through 800 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Catawba to near Jump River to 8 miles west of Sheldon. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chelsea and Westboro around 710 PM CDT. Rib Lake around 715 PM CDT. Medford around 725 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wood Lake, Polley, The Mondeaux Flowage, Highway 13 And County Road M, Stetsonville, Perkinstown, County Roads A And E, Highway M And Joe Martin Road, Esadore Lake and Camp Forest Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
